categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Seran was a female Human apprentice of the Sith Lord Khreusis living during the Cold War. She was present when her master was confronted by Kallig, who sought to acquire his mask.
Seran appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on the planet Korriban.
